reviewText: Although neither Richard Chamberlain nor Jaclyn Smith, king and queen of the mini-series were not in this one, LACE 1 & 2 were spectacular.  The intrigue over who the parents were kept you captivated. Phoebe Cates was exceptional! Hope they eventually place the movie on DVD.

Fortunately, I was able to catch this on Oxygen about 3 years ago and popped in a blank vhs!  I really enjoyed it, even as cheesy as it was.  I see it is now on dvd on ebay.  Don't know how long it will be on there though.  Overall, the movie/mini-series was a great watch! :)  I love the eighties!

I saw this in pre-teens and I still remember how Phoebe Cates' character confronted the three best friends about the secret they had been keeping for almost 20 years. I look forward to it coming out on DVD.
This was such a fun three part tv movie. I saw it in my teens. Phoebe Kates was so hot in this. Friends say they'd like to see it, but alas no dvd.
I love this movie.  It's such a shame that it hasn't been released on DVD.

I remember seeing this movie in my teens and to this day, this is the best movie I have ever seen.  Its romantic and fun to watch.  It has intrigue and mystery.  I just hope that one day, it comes out on DVD.
I wanted to watch these movies but can not play them on an American dvd player..its European form..i didn't realize it when I ordered it ..so had to be sent back... too bad..
a must see, great movie with a life time worth of experiences

I am also one who had seen this in my teens and have longed to watch again and again. If it is released on DVD I am sure it would fly off the shelves as it were.
The story was very compelling and held your interest to the very end.
I look forward to hearing about it's release to DVD.

I saw this movie when it first aired on TV and have been searching for it every since.  Phoebe Cates et. al were remarkable.  The tagline "which one of you [....] is my mother?" is what made this movie memorable. I am still waiting to see it on DVD; hopefully, that will happen soon.  There are so many fans waiting for this to happen.  SO MAKE IT HAPPEN.

I love this movie but why is it still on VHS?
Who the heck still owns a vhs player? Maybe the old folks who hold onto the past. Come on. Will anyone put this into a CURRENT functional format anytime soon?

This is such a beautiful movie.
Phoebe Cates is stunning here. Get with the program people.

I first watched this movie as a teenager with my mother along time ago. I would watch it ever time it came on TV but, hasn't come on TV in a very long time. I wish they would put this movie on to a DVD I would buy it immediately. To me this is a movie classic must have.

I assumed this would be on DVD, but now it's not even available in VHS!!  This is unreal.

I LOVE this movie!!  My favorite scene is the final one.  Finding out which of the three women is the mother is more intense than any who-done-it film (well actually, we find out who-done-it 20 years earlier!).  Phoebe Cates' beauty is intoxicating.

I have a question, but it contains a S-P-O-I-L-E-R.
*
*
*
*
If Lili's mother had been Maxine, wouldn't that mean Lili had sex with her half-brother?
I also saw this in my early teens and was blown away by it.  I so am dying for this to come out on dvd so I can watch it again and again.
